name: ListContainer
description: The ListContainer class is a UI container component that displays scrollable lists of items in a grid layout. It provides built-in scrolling functionality, item selection, and customizable click handlers.
overview: The ListContainer class provides a comprehensive list display solution with features including scrollable list display, a 5-column grid layout, built-in item selection with visual feedback, customizable callbacks, dynamic item management, and hover tooltips for truncated text.

constructors.signature: new ListContainer(x, y, width, height, textRenderer, list, parent, onSelect)
constructors.description: Creates a new ListContainer with specified position, dimensions, and content.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the container's top-left corner

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the container's top-left corner

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the container in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the container in pixels

parameters.name: textRenderer
parameters.description: Minecraft text renderer for drawing text

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: Initial list of text items to display

parameters.name: onSelect
parameters.description: Callback function when an item is selected

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new item to the end of the list. Items are automatically arranged in a 5-column grid layout.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The text content for the new list item

examples:
// Add a new item to the list
listContainer.addItem(Chat.createTextHelperFromString("New Item"));

methods.name: setSelected
methods.description: Sets the currently selected item and triggers the selection callback. Previous selection is deselected.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the item to select (0-based)

methods.name: onScrollbar
methods.description: Internal method called when the scrollbar position changes. Updates visibility and position of items.

methods.name: setVisible
methods.description: Sets the visibility of the container and all its child elements.

parameters.name: visible
parameters.description: Whether the container should be visible

methods.name: getVisible
methods.description: Gets the current visibility state of the container.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Updates the position and dimensions of the container.

methods.name: getButtons
methods.description: Gets a list of all button widgets in the container.
examples:
const buttons = listContainer.getButtons();
Chat.log(`Container has ${buttons.size()} buttons`);
